channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Popup Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Popup Builder

item.title: CVE-2023-3226|2024-08-02T06:48:08.186Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder
item.description: The Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 4.2.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).

item.title: CVE-2023-6000|2024-08-02T08:14:25.138Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder
item.description: The Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 4.2.3 does not prevent simple visitors from updating existing popups, and injecting raw JavaScript in them, which could lead to Stored XSS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-6294|2024-08-02T08:28:21.292Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder
item.description: The Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 4.2.6 does not validate a parameter before making a request to it, which could allow users with the administrator role to perform SSRF attack in Multisite WordPress configurations.

item.title: CVE-2023-6294|2024-08-01T17:56:14.455Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder
item.description: The Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 4.2.6 does not validate a parameter before making a request to it, which could allow users with the administrator role to perform SSRF attack in Multisite WordPress configurations.

item.title: CVE-2024-3236|2024-06-17T06:00:01.133Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder
item.description: The Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 1.1.33 does not sanitise and escape some of its Notification fields, which could allow users such as contributor and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-6294|2024-02-12T16:07:36.681Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder
item.description: The Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 4.2.6 does not validate a parameter before making a request to it, which could allow users with the administrator role to perform SSRF attack in Multisite WordPress configurations.

item.title: CVE-2024-3236|2024-06-17T13:34:06.345Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder
item.description: The Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 1.1.33 does not sanitise and escape some of its Notification fields, which could allow users such as contributor and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-3236|2024-08-01T20:05:08.361Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder
item.description: The Popup Builder WordPress plugin before 1.1.33 does not sanitise and escape some of its Notification fields, which could allow users such as contributor and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
